snippet.title: THE GOTCHIVERSE: Official Cinematic Reveal | Aavegotchi NFT Gaming Metaverse
snippet.description:
#nftgame #nftgaming #playtoearn #trailer
The #Gotchiverse is Pixelcraft Studio’s flagship title that celebrates the best of #blockchain technology. 

The #metaverse is built on #Aavegotchi, an open-source, community owned, #NFT gaming protocol that unlocks true asset ownership for gamers. In this spirit, The Gotchiverse is co-created with direct input from the community via AavegotchiDAO. 

Summon your first Aavegotchi today and meet us in the Gotchiverse!

👀 Play now: https://verse.aavegotchi.com/ 
🤝 Borrow an Aavegotchi: https://app.aavegotchi.com/lending

👇 Visit our website to learn more 👇
https://www.aavegotchi.com
https://www.wiki.aavegotchi.com
https://www.gotchiverse.io

👇 Join the GotchiGang community 👇
Twitter: https://twitter.com/aavegotchi  
Discord: https://discord.gg/aavegotchi
Telegram: https://t.me/aavegotchi
Official Blog: https://blog.aavegotchi.com
Medium: https://aavegotchi.medium.com/
